narrative: Established broader scaffold for incoming FTS components. Added directories for migrations, RL agents, strategies, backtesting, caching, vector DB interfaces and configuration. Expanded specifications to reflect QuestDB usage, vector similarity options, Redis caching, RL details, and updated README accordingly.
user_input: Seek to advance what you can in this whole work we started...
scene: Before, the repo only included minimal scaffolds and high-level specs. Now there is a clear structure for database migrations, RL modules, strategies, backtesting, vector similarity, and caching, allowing incoming contributions to slot in easily.
